name: Toyota GR Supra
description: The legend returns. A pure driving machine, the GR Supra is a masterpiece of design and engineering.

name: BMW Z4
description: Open-top driving pleasure. The BMW Z4 combines classic roadster aesthetics with modern dynamics.

name: Audi TT Coupe
description: A design icon. The Audi TT Coupe stands for style, sportiness, and innovative technology.

name: Nissan Z
description: 50 years of thrill. The all-new Nissan Z is a sports car that's pure excitement.

name: Subaru BRZ
description: Rear-wheel-drive fun. The Subaru BRZ is engineered for an exhilarating and affordable sports car experience.

name: Honda CBR1000RR-R
description: Born to race. The Fireblade SP is a track-focused superbike with MotoGP technology.

name: Yamaha YZF-R1M
description: R for Racing. The YZF-R1M is a special edition superbike with premium Ohlins suspension and carbon fiber bodywork.
